item.title: Summary for Tropical Depression Pamela (EP1/EP162021)
item.author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
item.description: ...PAMELA NOW A TROPICAL DEPRESSION OVER WEST-CENTRAL MEXICO... ...REMNANTS EXPECTED TO CONTRIBUTE TO HEAVY RAINFALL OVER TEXAS AND OKLAHOMA... As of 4:00 PM CDT Wed Oct 13 the center of Pamela was located near 26.0, -103.7 with movement NE at 28 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1003 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 35 mph.

item.title: Tropical Depression Pamela Public Advisory Number 15
item.description:
...PAMELA NOW A TROPICAL DEPRESSION OVER WEST-CENTRAL MEXICO... ...REMNANTS EXPECTED TO CONTRIBUTE TO HEAVY RAINFALL OVER TEXAS AND OKLAHOMA...
Location: 26.0°N 103.7°W
Max sustained: 35 mph
Moving: NE at 28 mph
Min pressure: 1003 mb

Issued at 400 PM CDT Wed Oct 13 2021
item.author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
